title: Streets of fire
content:
This is a fun game!

[url=http://www.flashplayer.com/games/streetsoffire_movie.php#bottom]www.flashplayer.com/games...php#bottom[/url]

GOAL

You are a flame, and you run around burning down buildings. Burn buildings to get 1234 points. If you run out of fuel, you lose the game. Grab the canisters to get more fuel. You get a bonus for burning all the buildings in an area.A proud member of the beta testing society
[url=http://www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html]www.garfield.com/comics/comics_todays.html[/url]
Down with VGA! Up with EGA!
Email me a beta at [url=mailto:HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com] HarveySmiths3rdemail@hotmail.com[/url]! :-)
